_sText:
Features
==================
- Rotating world(Fixed rotation cycle)
- Music(Random selection)
- Loads of fun and death

Rotating world? Wut?
==================
The map itself rotates by 90 degrees every 5 - 15 seconds.
Here's a video showing the rotation cycle: [video link](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s4FBH-P_5kI "trololo")

Bugs and notes
==================
Notes
------------------
- The screenshots above were taken from the same position and angle

Bugs
------------------
- Sometimes, you might get killed by the map for no apparent reason
- Walking on the map can become strange after a few rotations

The Source engine doesn't handle moving brushes very well, so the bugs noted above are likely caused by that.

Future features
==================
- Random rotation cycle
